com.golden.gamedev.engine.lwjgl
Class LWJGLInput

java.lang.Object
  com.golden.gamedev.engine.lwjgl.LWJGLInput
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.golden.gamedev.engine.BaseInput
public class LWJGLInput
extends Object
implements com.golden.gamedev.engine.BaseInput

Input engine used in LWJGL graphics enviroment,
LWJGL is available to download at http://lwjgl.org/.

Make sure the downloaded library is included into your game classpath before using this input engine.

Note: GTGE is not associated in any way with LWJGL, this class is only interfacing LWJGL to be used in GTGE.
This class is created and has been tested to be working properly using LWJGL v0.95.

convertToAWT

public static int convertToAWT(int lwjglKeyCode)
Conversion LWJGL key code to AWT key code. This is an O(1) complexity operation.

Parameters:
lwjglKeyCode - the LWJGL key code to convert
Returns:
The AWT key code for the given LWJGL key code.

convertToLWJGL

public static int convertToLWJGL(int awtKeyCode)
Conversion AWT key code to LWJGL key code. This is an O(1) complexity operation.

Parameters:
awtKeyCode - the AWT key code to convert
Returns:
The LWJGL key code for the given AWT key code.
